name: Global COMBO Jam
description:
Gameplay

Multiplayer
Fight a friend a friend in this 1vs1 jungle jazzy combo madness.
Use WASD and Arrow keys to create combos in order to push your rival to the end of the battling platform.

Story

Experience the daily legend of the epic battle between the sun and moon goddesses in order to decide whether there is another night or day.

Check out more of our shitty games!

Credits:
  •  Art: Jose Pacheco
  • Code: Markus Villalobos

This game was made in a 2 day game jam
